metadata.name: DBforPostgreSQL Flexible Servers
metadata.description: This module deploys a DBforPostgreSQL Flexible Server.
Required. The name of the PostgreSQL flexible server.
Optional. The administrator login name of a server. Can only be specified when the PostgreSQL server is being created.
Optional. The administrator login password.
Optional. If Enabled, Azure Active Directory authentication is enabled.
Optional. If Enabled, password authentication is enabled.
Optional. Tenant id of the server.
Optional. The Azure AD administrators when AAD authentication enabled.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Required. The name of the sku, typically, tier + family + cores, e.g. Standard_D4s_v3.
Required. The tier of the particular SKU. Tier must align with the "skuName" property. Example, tier cannot be "Burstable" if skuName is "Standard_D4s_v3".
Optional. Availability zone information of the server. Default will have no preference set.
Optional. Backup retention days for the server.
Optional. A value indicating whether Geo-Redundant backup is enabled on the server. Should be left disabled if 'cMKKeyName' is not empty.
Optional. Max storage allowed for a server.
Optional. PostgreSQL Server version.
Optional. The mode for high availability.
Optional. The mode to create a new PostgreSQL server.
Conditional. The ID(s) to assign to the resource. Required if 'cMKKeyName' is not empty.
Conditional. The resource ID of a key vault to reference a customer managed key for encryption from. Required if 'cMKKeyName' is not empty.
Optional. The name of the customer managed key to use for encryption.
Optional. The version of the customer managed key to reference for encryption. If not provided, the latest key version is used.
Conditional. User assigned identity to use when fetching the customer managed key. The identity should have key usage permissions on the Key Vault Key. Required if 'cMKKeyName' is not empty.
Optional. Properties for the maintenence window. If provided, "customWindow" property must exist and set to "Enabled".
Conditional. Required if "createMode" is set to "PointInTimeRestore".
Conditional. Required if "createMode" is set to "PointInTimeRestore".
Optional. Delegated subnet arm resource ID. Used when the desired connectivity mode is "Private Access" - virtual network integration.

Optional. Private dns zone arm resource ID. Used when the desired connectivity mode is "Private Access" and required when "delegatedSubnetResourceId" is used. The Private DNS Zone must be lined to the Virtual Network referenced in "delegatedSubnetResourceId".
Optional. The firewall rules to create in the PostgreSQL flexible server.
Optional. The databases to create in the server.
Optional. The configurations to create in the server.
Optional. Specify the type of lock.

Optional. Array of role assignment objects that contain the 'roleDefinitionIdOrName' and 'principalId' to define RBAC role assignments on this resource. In the roleDefinitionIdOrName attribute, you can provide either the display name of the role definition, or its fully qualified ID in the following format: '/providers/Microsoft.Authorization/roleDefinitions/c2f4ef07-c644-48eb-af81-4b1b4947fb11'.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic storage account.
Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic log analytics workspace.
Optional. Resource ID of the diagnostic event hub authorization rule for the Event Hubs namespace in which the event hub should be created or streamed to.
Optional. Name of the diagnostic event hub within the namespace to which logs are streamed. Without this, an event hub is created for each log category.
Optional. The name of logs that will be streamed. "allLogs" includes all possible logs for the resource. Set to '' to disable log collection.
Optional. The name of metrics that will be streamed.
Optional. The name of the diagnostic setting, if deployed. If left empty, it defaults to "<resourceName>-diagnosticSettings".

metadata.description: This module deploys a DBforPostgreSQL Flexible Server Firewall Rule.
Required. The name of the PostgreSQL flexible server Firewall Rule.
Required. The start IP address of the firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format. Use value '0.0.0.0' for all Azure-internal IP addresses.
Required. The end IP address of the firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format. Must be greater than or equal to startIpAddress. Use value '0.0.0.0' for all Azure-internal IP addresses.
Conditional. The name of the parent PostgreSQL flexible server. Required if the template is used in a standalone deployment.
Optional. Enable telemetry via a Globally Unique Identifier (GUID).
